named-query.name: PermissionGroupForName
named-query.query: SELECT g FROM PermissionGroup g WHERE LOWER(g.name) = LOWER(:name)

named-query.name: TidbitKindForName
named-query.query: SELECT k FROM TidbitKind k WHERE LOWER(k.name) = LOWER(:name)

named-query.name: TidbitKindsForName
named-query.query: SELECT k FROM TidbitKind k WHERE LOWER(k.name) LIKE :name

named-query.name: TidbitsAll
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM Tidbit t ORDER BY t.creationDateItem DESC, t.id DESC

named-native-query.name: TidbitUpdateKindReassign
named-native-query.query: UPDATE tidbit SET kindid = ? WHERE kindid = ?

named-native-query.name: TidbitsExport
named-native-query.query: SELECT t.name, k.name, t.data, t.creation_date, t.modify_date, t.comment, k.comment, t.tidbitid, t.created_by, k.kindid FROM tidbit t INNER JOIN tidbit_kind k ON k.kindid = t.kindid ORDER BY t.creation_date
